pre-battle-txt: My name is Yzebel a Rich Citizen
of Utica
Or at last It use to be that,
6 month ago
Romans Sack Utica, toke me as salve
I was now Principe Romulus Econus
Property
On a night
we was stationed near a beach
Romulus was guarding the boats
After his watch, like every night
He decide to plante his dager in me
But this night, I decide his dagger
was better plant in his own belly
I then take his bellonging,
wear it, go out of his tent
2 Roman was there
they where unhappy to see Romulus
Red Body fluid on me
But it was just the appertiser
win-txt: One guy was now lying dead
the other one on his knee
I decide to grant his wish
Then cut his arm and tell
You leave and try to find
an escape out of the camp
